Name: Arcane Conundrum
Description: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target (5...13...15 seconds). Doubles spell casting time. End effect: you gain 1...6...7 energy.

Name: Arcane Echo
Description: Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds.) Arcane Echo becomes the next spell you use (20 seconds). This enchantment ends if you use any skill that is not a spell.

Name: Arcane Mimicry
Description: Spell. This skill becomes target ally's elite skill (20 seconds). Cannot self-target. No effect if target's elite skill is a form.

Name: Backfire
Description: Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Target foe takes 35...119...140 damage whenever it casts a spell.

Name: Clumsiness
Description: Hex Spell. (4 seconds.) Also hexes adjacent foes. Interrupts next attack. Interruption effect: deals 10...76...92 damage.

Name: Conjure Phantasm
Description: Hex Spell. (2...13...16 seconds.) Causes -5 Health degeneration.

Name: Crippling Anguish
Description: Elite Hex Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) Target foe moves and attacks 50% slower and has -1...7...8 Health degeneration.

Name: Crippling Anguish (PvP)
Description: Elite Hex Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) Target foe moves 50% slower and has -1...4...5 Health degeneration.

Name: Cry of Frustration
Description: Spell. If target foe is using a skill
Energy: that foe and all foes in the area are interrupted and take 15...63...75 damage.

Name: Diversion
Description: Hex Spell. (6 seconds.) Target foe's next skill takes +10...47...56 seconds to recharge.

Name: Drain Enchantment
Description: Spell. Removes an enchantment from target foe. Removal effect: you gain 8...15...17 Energy and 40...104...120 Health.

Name: Echo
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Echo becomes the next skill you use (30 seconds).

Name: Empathy
Description: Hex Spell. (5...13...15 seconds.) Target foe's attacks deal 1...12...15 less damage
Energy: and that foe takes 10...46...55 damage with each attack.

Name: Empathy (PvP)
Description: Hex Spell. (5...13...15 seconds.) Target foe takes 15...39...45 damage whenever it attacks.

Name: Energy Burn
Description: Spell. Causes 1...8...10 Energy loss. Deals 9 damage for each point of Energy lost.

Name: Energy Drain
Description: Elite Spell. Causes 2...8...9 Energy loss. You gain 3 Energy for each point of Energy lost.

Name: Energy Surge
Description: Elite Spell. Causes 1...8...10 Energy loss. Deals 9 damage to target and nearby foes for each point of Energy lost.

Name: Energy Tap
Description: Spell. Causes 4...6...7 Energy loss. You gain 2 Energy for each point of Energy lost.

Name: Epidemic
Description: Spell. Conditions on target foe transfer to adjacent foes.

Name: Ether Feast
Description: Spell. Causes 3 Energy loss. You gain 20...56...65 Health for each point of Energy lost.

Name: Fragility
Description: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target (8...18...20 seconds). These foes take 5...17...20 damage each time they gain or lose a condition.

Name: Fragility (PvP)
Description: Hex Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) Target foe takes 5...17...20 damage each time it gains or loses a condition.

Name: Hex Breaker
Description: Stance. (5...65...80 seconds.) The next hex against you fails and the caster takes 10...39...46 damage.

Name: Ignorance
Description: Hex Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) Target foe cannot use signets.

Name: Illusion of Haste
Description: Enchantment Spell. (5...10...11 seconds.) You move 33% faster. [Initial effect]: removes Crippled condition. End effect: you are Crippled (3 seconds).

Name: Illusion of Haste (PvP)
Description: Enchantment Spell. (5...10...11 seconds.) You move 33% faster. End effect: you are Crippled (3 seconds).

Name: Imagined Burden
Description: Hex Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) Target foe moves 50% slower.

Name: Leech Signet
Description: Signet. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: you gain 3...13...15 Energy if the action was a spell.

Name: Mantra of Earth
Description: Stance. (30...78...90 seconds.) Reduces earth damage you take by 26...45...50%. You gain 2 Energy when you take earth damage.

Name: Mantra of Flame
Description: Stance. (30...78...90 seconds.) Reduces fire damage you take by 26...45...50%. You gain 2 Energy when you take fire damage.

Name: Mantra of Frost
Description: Stance. (30...78...90 seconds.) Reduces cold damage you take by 26...45...50%. You gain 2 Energy when you take cold damage.

Name: Mantra of Inscriptions
Description: Stance. (5...21...25 seconds.) Signets you successfully activate while in this stance recharge 10...34...40% faster.

Name: Mantra of Lightning
Description: Stance. (30...78...90 seconds.) Reduces lightning damage you take by 26...45...50%. You gain 2 Energy when you take lightning damage.

Name: Mantra of Persistence
Description: Stance. (5...21...25 seconds.) Illusion hexes you cast last 10...34...40% longer.

Name: Mantra of Recovery
Description: Elite Stance. (5...17...20 seconds.) Your spells recharge 33% faster.

Name: Mantra of Resolve
Description: Stance. (30...78...90 seconds.) Prevents interrupts against you. Prevention cost: lose 10...5...4 Energy or Mantra of Resolve ends.

Name: Mantra of Resolve (PvP)
Description: Stance. (5 seconds.) Prevents interrupts against you. Prevention cost: lose 10...5...4 Energy or Mantra of Resolve ends.

Name: Mind Wrack
Description: Hex Spell. (5...33...40 seconds.) Causes 1 Energy loss each time foe is the target of your non-hex Mesmer skills. Deals 5...21...25 damage per point of Energy lost. If target foe's Energy drops to 0
Energy: it takes 15...83...100 damage and Mind Wrack ends.

Name: Mind Wrack (PvP)
Description: Hex Spell. (5...33...40 seconds.) Causes 1 Energy loss each time foe is the target of your non-hex Mesmer skills. If target foe's Energy drops to 0
Energy: Mind Wrack ends and that foe takes 15...83...100 damage.

Name: Power Drain
Description: Spell. Interrupts a spell or chant. Interruption effect: you gain 1...25...31 Energy.

Name: Power Spike
Description: Spell. Interrupts a spell or chant. Interruption effect: deals 30...102...120 damage.

Name: Shatter Enchantment
Description: Spell. Removes an enchantment from target foe. Removal effect: deals 14...83...100 damage.

Name: Shatter Hex
Description: Spell. Removes a hex from target ally. Removal effect: deals 30...102...120 damage to foes near this ally.

Name: Signet of Humility
Description: Signet. Disables elite skill (1...13...16 second[s]). Disables your non-Mesmer skills (10 seconds).

Name: Soothing Images
Description: Hex Spell. Also hexes foe adjacent to target. (8...18...20 seconds). These foes cannot gain adrenaline.

Name: Spirit Shackles
Description: Hex Spell. (5...17...20). Target foe loses 5 Energy whenever it attacks.

Name: Time Ward
Description: Elite Ward Spell. (3...13...15 seconds.) Allies in this ward cast spells 15...19...20% faster and recharge skills 15...19...20% faster. Allied spirits are not affected. PvE Skill
